alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 6:48PM MDT until July 02 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM MDT FOR WESTERN LAWRENCE...SOUTHWESTERN PENNINGTON...NORTHEASTERN WESTON AND SOUTHEASTERN CROOK COUNTIES... At 647 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles south of Sundance to 6 miles southeast of Inyan Kara Mountain to 2 miles southeast of Redbank Spring Campground, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Deerfield, Deerfield Reservoir, Redbank Spring Campground, Flag Mountain, Rochford, O`Neil Pass, Cement Ridge Lookout, Mystic, Crooks Tower, Cheyenne Crossing, Iron Creek Lake, Roughlock Falls, Savoy, Black Fox Campground, Crow Peak, Bridal Veil Falls, Spearfish Canyon, Terry Peak, Spearfish, Lead, Deadwood and Central City. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 8 and 15. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
